title: One-sided limits compared to overall limit

content.question: The figure above shows the graph of a function f with domain0≤x≤4 . Which of the following statements are true? I. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup> <mn>2</mn> <mo>−</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaaGOma8aadaahaaadbeqaa8qacqGHsislaaaal8aabeaak8qaca WGMbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@41E2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> exists. II. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup> <mn>2</mn> <mo>+</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaaGOma8aadaahaaadbeqaa8qacqGHRaWkaaaal8aabeaak8qaca WGMbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@41D7@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> exists. III. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaaGOmaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaadAgadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaGaay jkaiaawMcaaaaa@409D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> exists.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
